rows.MILESTONE PRESS RELEASES: Press releases for each core event - use for social, email, investor updates
When: Supply, credibility, and capital secured
IonWave Secures Supply Chain for Revolutionary Ocean-Sourced Electrolyte

[CITY, DATE] — IonWave today announced it has secured its supply chain and initial capital to bring a first-of-its-kind ocean-sourced electrolyte supplement to market.

The company has partnered with [Supplier Name], a leading producer of marine minerals, to source its proprietary 78-mineral formula. Unlike conventional electrolyte products that contain only 3-4 synthetic minerals, IonWave's formula mirrors the mineral composition of human plasma.

"We spent months finding the right partner who could deliver the quality and purity we demand," said [Founder Name]. "This milestone means we're ready to bring this product to the customers who need it most."

The company has also secured commitments from [X] health and wellness influencers who will help launch the product to their combined audience of [X] followers.

IonWave plans to begin shipping to customers within [X] weeks.

For more information, visit [website].
When: First real sale ships, money clears
IonWave Ships First Orders, Customers Report Immediate Results

[CITY, DATE] — IonWave has officially shipped its first customer orders, marking the commercial launch of its ocean-sourced electrolyte supplement.

Early customers are already reporting positive experiences. "[Customer quote about feeling different/better]," said [Customer Name], one of the first buyers.

The company fulfilled [X] orders in its first [timeframe], exceeding initial projections. The average order value of $[X] and early subscription sign-up rate of [X]% suggest strong product-market fit.

"Seeing real customers receive our product and feel the difference—that's what makes all the work worth it," said [Founder Name]. "We're just getting started."

IonWave is currently available exclusively at [website].
IonWave Cracks Growth Code, Prepares to Scale

[CITY, DATE] — After extensive testing, IonWave has identified a scalable customer acquisition strategy and is preparing to accelerate growth.

The company tested over [X] ad variations across [X] weeks before finding messaging that resonates with its target audience of health-conscious consumers. The winning approach emphasizes [key message/angle].

"We didn't just want growth—we wanted profitable, sustainable growth," said [Founder Name]. "Now we have a formula we can scale with confidence."

Customer metrics continue to exceed expectations, with a [X]% subscription rate and [X]% of customers reporting they would recommend IonWave to friends.

The company is now seeking [investment/partnership] to accelerate its growth trajectory.
IonWave Reaches $100K Monthly Revenue, Proves Premium D2C Model

[CITY, DATE] — IonWave has reached $100,000 in monthly recurring revenue, a milestone that validates its premium, direct-to-consumer approach in the competitive electrolyte market.

The company achieved this milestone in just [X] months with a lean team and without retail distribution. Key metrics include:
• [X]% subscription rate (vs. industry average of ~20%)
• [X]% month-over-month growth
• [X]+ five-star reviews
• Customer acquisition cost of $[X] (LTV:CAC ratio of [X]:1)

"This proves that consumers are willing to pay for quality and transparency," said [Founder Name]. "We're competing with billion-dollar brands not by outspending them, but by out-caring them."

The company plans to [next phase: new products, expand team, etc.].
